price: Isaan “Rahmaan ilma godhate” jedhu, Inni qulqullaa’eera, Lakkii isaan (maleykoonni) gabroota (Rabbii) kabajamoodha.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
